type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ProjectDependency
type.description: A ProjectDependency is a Dependency on another project in the current project hierarchy.

method.name: getDependencyProject
method.description: Returns the project associated with this project dependency.

method.name: getProjectConfiguration

property.name: dependencyProject
property.description: Returns the project associated with this project dependency.

property.name: projectConfiguration
